Olivia Podmore inquest: ‘We could lose someone’, doctor warned High Performance Sport NZ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/olivia-podmore-inquest-we-could-lose-someone-doctor-warned-high-performance-sport-nz/KQ6TENGTFVG6ZL4QBOSOXQEDCE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/olivia-podmore-inquest-we-could-lose-someone-doctor-warned-high-performance-sport-nz/KQ6TENGTFVG6ZL4QBOSOXQEDCE/ A senior doctor who had worked closely with the athletes warned they were 'at risk'. Fri, 22 Nov 2024 02:28:44 +0000 The head of High Performance Sport NZ was warned in 2018 of concerns “we would have an athlete kill themselves” if the environment in Cycling NZ was not fixed, an inquest into the death of elite cyclist Olivia Podmore has heard. Photo / Getty Images
